name: Peppermill Royal Suite
description: Enjoy elegance, spaciousness, and privacy in the 1,090 sq. ft. Peppermill Royal Suite. Features a dining area, bar, sitting area with comfortable sofa, separate bedroom, 1.5 bathrooms, and three televisions. Custom-made plush double pillow-top mattresses, luxurious triple sheeting, and 24-hour room service complete the experience.
shortDescription: 1,090 sq. ft. Peppermill Royal Suite — separate bedroom, bar, dining area, and 1.5 bathrooms.

faqs.question: How big is the Peppermill Royal Suite?
faqs.answer: 1,090 sq. ft. with a separate bedroom, 1.5 bathrooms, bar, dining area, and three televisions.

faqs.question: Does the Royal Suite have room service?
faqs.answer: Yes — 24-hour room service is included along with all AAA Four Diamond amenities.

testimonials.quote: The Royal Suite at Peppermill is the real deal. Separate bedroom, full bar, dining room — it felt like a private apartment. Our best golf trip accommodation ever.
testimonials.author: Chris P.

testimonials.quote: Over 1,000 sq ft of Peppermill luxury. Three TVs, a bar, and a separate bedroom. GTHS booked it as part of our package and the value was incredible.
testimonials.author: Dan F.
